languages.text: "Мятеж против законного губернатора — ересь. Приказываю вам немедленно сложить оружие!"

traits.locale_text: "Приказываю вам немедленно сдаться — или убью вас так же, как и ваших друзей-мятежников!"

languages.text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"
languages.original_text: "Мятеж против законного губернатора — ересь. Приказываю вам немедленно сложить оружие!"

traits.locale_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"
"An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"
"An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"
"An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"
"An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"
"An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

languages.text: "Ein Aufstand gegen Euren rechtmäßigen Gouverneur ist Ketzerei. Ich befehle Euch, augenblicklich die Waffen niederzulegen!"
languages.original_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Aufstand gegen Euren rechtmäßigen Gouverneur ist Ketzerei. Ich befehle Euch, augenblicklich die Waffen niederzulegen!"

languages.text: « Une insurrection contre votre gouverneur légitime n'est rien de moins qu'une hérésie. Je vous ordonne de déposer vos armes sur-le-champ ! »
languages.original_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

traits.locale_text: « Une insurrection contre votre gouverneur légitime n'est rien de moins qu'une hérésie. Je vous ordonne de déposer vos armes sur-le-champ ! »

languages.text: “反抗合法统治者，发起叛乱，这等同于异端行为。我命令你们立即放下武器！”
languages.original_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

traits.locale_text: “反抗合法统治者，发起叛乱，这等同于异端行为。我命令你们立即放下武器！”

languages.text: 「正当な支配者に対する反乱は、異端と同じだ。直ちに武器を捨てよ！」
languages.original_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

traits.locale_text: 「正当な支配者に対する反乱は、異端と同じだ。直ちに武器を捨てよ！」

languages.text: «Una insurgencia contra su legítimo gobernador equivale a herejía. ¡Les ordeno que bajen las armas de inmediato!».
languages.original_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

traits.locale_text: «Una insurgencia contra su legítimo gobernador equivale a herejía. ¡Les ordeno que bajen las armas de inmediato!».

languages.text: "Meşru valinize isyan, kâfirliğe girer. Silahlarınızı derhâl bırakmanızı emrediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "An insurgency against your lawful governor amounts to heresy. I command you to lay down your arms at once!"

traits.locale_text: "Meşru valinize isyan, kâfirliğe girer. Silahlarınızı derhâl bırakmanızı emrediyorum!"
